roleset.name: to experiment or play with something
roleset.note: TOY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'toy" based on instances in Webtext 25.2 files. Frame added by Kevin. (from toy.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: From Webtext 25.2
example.text: As Marshall toyed with "flexibility" -- and the Joint Chiefs cherry-picked his conuring of Moscow's might for their own budgetary purposes, while ignoring the real import, and limits, of RMA -- the Cold War ended in the equivocations and evasions of Bill Clinton's two terms in office and the low-rent, self-congratulatory installing of mafia regimes in Bosnia and Kosovo.
